props.name: collapseAllHandleRef
props.doc: ref handle to collapse all expanded accordion rows. Send in a ref and use `.current()` to collapse all rows.

props.name: mode
props.doc: Defines how the Table should look. Use `accordion` for an accordion-like table. Use `navigation` for a navigation table.

props.name: accordionChevronPlacement
props.doc: Defines where the chevron will be placed, should only be used together with mode="accordion".

props.name: border
props.doc: Use `true` to show borders between table data cells.

props.name: outline
props.doc: Use `true` to show an outline border around the table

props.name: sticky
props.doc: Use `true` to enable a sticky Table header. Or use `'css-position'` to enable the CSS based scroll behavior.

props.name: stickyOffset
props.doc: Defines the offset (top) in `rem` from where the header should start to stick. You may define your app header height here, if you have a sticky header on your page.

props.name: size
props.doc: Spacing size inside the table header and data.

props.name: fixed
props.doc: If set to `true`, the table will behave with a fixed table layout, using: `table-layout: fixed;`. Use e.g. CSS `width: 40%` on a table column to define the width.

props.name: children
props.doc: The content of the component.

props.name: className
props.doc: Custom className on the component root

props.name: skeleton
props.doc: If set to `true`, an overlaying skeleton with animation will be shown.

props.name: noSpacing
props.doc: If set to `true`, no padding will be added.

props.name: spacing
props.doc: Set to `horizontal` for padding on left and right side.

props.name: sortable
props.doc: Defines the table header as sortable if set to `true` (ascending).

props.name: active
props.doc: Defines the sortable column as the current active (ascending).

props.name: reversed
props.doc: Defines the sortable column as in reversed order (descending).

props.name: noWrap
props.doc: if set to `true`, the inherited header text will not wrap to new lines.

props.name: onClick
props.doc: Will emit when user clicks/expands or on keydown space/enter(in mode="accordion" and mode="navigation") in the table row. Returns a native click.

props.name: onOpened
props.doc: Will emit when table row is expanded. Returns an object with the table row as the target: `{ target }`.

props.name: onClosed
props.doc: Will emit when table row is closed (after it was open). Returns an object with the table row as the target: `{ target }`.

props.name: variant
props.doc: Override the automatic variant of the current row. The next row one will continue with the opposite.

props.name: expanded
props.doc: use `true` to render the `<Tr>` initially as expanded.

props.name: disabled
props.doc: use `true` to disable the `<Tr>` to be accessible as an interactive element.

props.name: noAnimation
props.doc: use `true` to disable the expand/collapse animation.
